## Protected Member Functions

### computeCallSiteTable() {#a8db890ae03cb072b7198ebcc5d52028b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void WasmException::computeCallSiteTable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ehstreamer/callsiteentry">CallSiteEntry</a> &gt; &amp; CallSites, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ehstreamer/callsiterange">CallSiteRange</a> &gt; &amp; CallSiteRanges, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/landingpadinfo">LandingPadInfo</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; LandingPads, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; unsigned &gt; &amp; FirstActions)</>}
  labels = {["protected", "virtual"]}>
Compute the call-site table and the call-site ranges.

Compute the call-site table.

The entry for an invoke has a try-range containing the call, a non-zero landing pad and an appropriate action. The entry for an ordinary call has a try-range containing the call and zero for the landing pad and the action. Calls marked &#39;nounwind&#39; have no entry and must not be contained in the try-range of any entry - they form gaps in the table. Entries must be ordered by try-range address. CallSiteRanges vector is only populated for Itanium exception handling.

The entry for an invoke has a try-range containing the call, a non-zero landing pad, and an appropriate action. The entry for an ordinary call has a try-range containing the call and zero for the landing pad and the action. Calls marked &#39;nounwind&#39; have no entry and must not be contained in the try-range of any entry - they form gaps in the table. Entries must be ordered by try-range address.

Call-sites are split into one or more call-site ranges associated with different sections of the function.


<ul>
<li>Without -basic-block-sections, all call-sites are grouped into one call-site-range corresponding to the function section.</li>
<li>With -basic-block-sections, one call-site range is created for each section, with its FragmentBeginLabel and FragmentEndLabel respectively</li>
</ul>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/wasmexception-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/wasmexception-h">WasmException.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/wasmexception-cpp/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/wasmexception-cpp">WasmException.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
